features: Premium Clear Plastic Envelopes: Set of 4 pcs 12.8” x 9.2” plastic folders (Blue, Red, Yellow, Purple), made of high quality plastic, thick, sealed nicely on edges, sturdy, not easy to come apart or fray, reusable and durable. Transparent, See through easily, help sort out different type of paper, organize your desk, and reduce mess.

Plastic Envelopes with Label Pocket: Each file bag come with a label pocket and one label card inside, you can freely write the keyword referring to the content inside, so you can identify and find the document you need shortly. Plus, both sides of the label card are writable, so you can mark TWICE for different purpose.

Plastic Folder with Snap Closure: Each plastic envelope has a secure snap closure, won’t open itself while make it pretty easy to open and close the envelope, so you can get what you need quickly, effectively save your time!

Keep Paper in Mint Condition: Waterproof, highly wear-resistant, well against water, dust, wrinkle, scratch, friction, damage, and loss, great for storing and transporting important documents, and protect fragile items like old newspaper and files.

Multipurpose File Folders: A4 plastic file envelopes, fit for A4 size/standard US letter size paper, great for papers, stationery, brief report,bills, receipts, appliance instructions, photos, for craft items, craft papers, stickers, embellishments, for storing travelling items, makeup items and so on. Suitable for school, office, home, travel etc..

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Package Includes: 4 x Plastic Envelope with Pocket Specifications: Material: Premium Plastic Color: Blue, Red, Yellow, Purple Sizes: 12.8 x 9.2 inches Sturdy & Reusable Plastic Envelope with Snap Closure --Made of premium plastic, thick, sealed nicely on edges, sturdy, not easy to come apart or fray. --Waterproof, sturdy, firm, can well protect your papers against water, scratch, friction, dust. --With secure snap closure, easy to open and close, help you get what you need quickly. --Transparent, you can see what’s inside easily without opening, good for quick-searching.

Convenient Plastic Folder with Pockets Each file bag come with a label pocket and one label card inside, you can freely write the keyword referring to the content inside, so you can identify and find the document you need shortly. Plus, both sides of the label card are writable, so you can mark TWICE for different purpose. Keep Your Paper in Good Condition --Protect your papers against water, scratch, friction, dust etc. --Keep paper away from wrinkles, crease, damage, smear, and loss. --Great for storing and transporting important documents, and protect fragile items like old newspaper and files.

Multipurpose Filing Envelopes ✓ for school use, to hold papers, handouts, notes, lesson material, stationery, stickers ✓ for office use, to keep brief report, project document, finance statement, contracts ✓ for home use, to store bills, invoice, receipts, appliance instructions, photos ✓ for craft items, craft papers, stickers, embellishments, sewing patterns, stencils ✓ for travelling items, ID card, passport, map, stamp, postcard , journal ✓ for makeup items, eyebrow pencil, lipstick, eye-shadow, eyeliner, mascara cream ✓ for toys, puzzles, data wire, photos etc..
Your satisfaction is always our top priority, any problems, please don’t hesitate to let us know, we’ll be at your service with heart and soul.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great buy for the price but wish they were a tad more durable
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these 12.8" X 9.2" plastic envelopes to get and stay organized for an 11 day Girl Scout trip. Each day had it's own folder with our schedule, the little 3 X 5" lanyard schedules for each scouts lanyard, our printed tour / activity confirmations along with any relevant correspondences, the badge requirements we would be working on each day, balances due, thank you cards, tip envelopes & a pencil & pen. I loved that these folders had a button closure feature. The handy dandy little pocket window and insert on the front of each folder gave me a space to pencil in the day, date and reminder to bring our troop checkbook and CC each day. They worked great. I used folder #12 for leader paperwork that I had to take with us each day such as the full schedule for the entire trip, each travelers health history forms, Emergency phone list & Troop Roster. Negative: The snaps broke on 2 folders but it was oddly on the lesser stuffed folders (only like 5 & 8 sheets of paper in each) so I think it was unfortunately a defect or poor quality for those 2 button closures. Despite that, I think these were a great investment and definitely helped me to keep things in order.
